Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 119th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1971...
Released by San Francisco on 4/1/1972...
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1975...
Traded from Baltimore to New York (A) on 4/18/1975 (Going to NYY: P B. Smith. Going to BAL: P J. Bell, P G. Ross)...
Injured on 4/3/1977 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/12/1977 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 7/9/1978 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/2/1979...
Injured on 6/13/1980 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1980, winning 2 games with a 2.16 ERA...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1980...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1981, going 5-0, 1.76...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1982, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1982, going 5-0, 0.62...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1982, going 5-0, 0.87...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1982, going 21-7, 1.98 ERA...
Injured on 5/29/1983 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1984, going 5-1, 2.05...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1984, going 4-0, 1.29...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1985, going 3-2, 1.45...
